ImageStruct

public ImageStruct(byte[] _buffer,
                   int _width,
                   int _height,
                   ECOLOR_FORMAT _colorFormat,
                   boolean _originIsUpperLeft,
                   double _timestamp,
                   com.metaio.sdk.jni.SWIGTYPE_p_void _capturingContext,
                   long _stride)
Parameters:
_buffer - pointer to the image data
_width - width of the image
_height - height of the image
_colorFormat - the color format
_originIsUpperLeft - true if the origin is upper left corner, false if lower left
_timestamp - timestamp when the image was created
_capturingContext - platform-specific capturing context object
_stride - stride of the image

compress

public ByteBuffer compress(long quality)
This function currently supports JPEG compression only. It is the responsibility of the caller to delete returned ByteBuffer structure and its contents.

Parameters:
quality - JPEG quality (1-100, 0 will pick the default quality) ByteBuffer containing compressed data on success, NULL on failure.
